name: Merkuro Calendar
summary: Manage your tasks and events with Calendar
description:
Merkuro is a small collection of applications to manage your calendar, your mail and your addressbook.

Merkuro Calendar is a Kirigami based calendar and task management application that uses Akonadi. It lets you add, edit and delete events and tasks from local and remote accounts of your choice, while keeping changes synchronised across your Plasma desktop or phone.

Merkuro Contact is a Kirigami based addressbook application.

Merkuro Mail is a work-in-progress mail application that uses Akonadi. For now, it just allows you to read your mail.
